ruleset.name: Best Practices
ruleset.description: Rules which enforce generally accepted best practices.

rule.name: FunctionNameTooShort
rule.message: Function names should have non-cryptic and clear names.
rule.description: Function names should be easy to understand and describe the intention. Makes developers happy.
rule.example:
fun cl() {} // violation, no unavailable attribute added to the function declaration
fun calculateLayout() // no violation
